chapper8.Description: 8. Sometimes I have felt that I could not distinguish my body from other objects around me.

chapper21.Description: 21. Sometimes I have had a passing thought that some part of my body was rotting away.

chapper12.Description: 12. Now and then, when I look in the mirror, my face seems quite different than usual.

chapper35.Description: 35. For several days at a time I have had such a heightened awareness of sights and sounds that I cannot shut then out.

chapper3.Description: 3. Sometimes people whom I know well begin to look like strangers.

chapper25.Description: 25. The boundaries of my body always seem clear.

chapper13.Description: 13. I have never had the passing feeling that my arms or legs have become longer than usual.

chapper31.Description: 31. Sometimes I feel like everything around me is tilting.

chapper7.Description: 7. I have sometimes felt confused as to whether my body was really my own.

chapper5.Description: 5. Often I have a day when indoor lights seem so bright that they bother my eyes.

chapper11.Description: 11. I sometimes have had the feeling that my body is abnormal.

chapper2.Description: 2. Occasionally I have felt as though my body did not exist.

chapper20.Description: 20. Ordinary colors sometimes seem much too bright to me.

chapper14.Description: 14. I have sometimes felt that some part of my body no longer belongs to me.

chapper34.Description: 34. At times I have wondered if my body was really my own.

chapper30.Description: 30. I have had the momentary feeling that the things I touch remain attached to my body.

chapper28.Description: 28. I can remember when it seemed as though one of my limbs took on an unusual shape.

chapper22.Description: 22. I have sometimes had the feeling that one of my arms or legs is disconnected from the rest of my body.

chapper29.Description: 29. I have had the momentary feeling that my body has become misshapen.

chapper6.Description: 6. My hands or feet have never seemed far away.

chapper18.Description: 18. I have sometimes had the feeling that my body is decaying inside.

chapper9.Description: 9. I have felt that my body and another person's body were one and the same.

chapper15.Description: 15. Sometimes when I look at things like tables and chairs, they seem strange.

chapper26.Description: 26. Sometimes I have had feelings that I am united with an object near me.

chapper27.Description: 27. Sometimes I have had the feeling that a part of my body is larger than it usually is.

chapper33.Description: 33. Parts of my body occasionally seem dead or unreal.

chapper32.Description: 32. I sometimes have to touch myself to make sure I'm still there.

chapper23.Description: 23. It has seemed at times as if my body was melting into my surroundings.

chapper17.Description: 17. Sometimes part of my body has seemed smaller than it usually is.

chapper19.Description: 19. Occasionally it has seemed as if my body had taken on the appearance of another person's body.

chapper16.Description: 16. I have felt as though my head or limbs were somehow not my own.

chapper1.Description: 1. I sometimes have had the feeling that some parts of my body are not attached to the same person.

chapper10.Description: 10. I have felt that something outside my body was a part of my body.

chapper4.Description: 4. My hearing is sometimes so sensitive that ordinary sounds become uncomfortable.

chapper24.Description: 24. I have never felt that my arms or legs have momentarily grown in size.
